verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* spake unto Moses , saying ,
Command the children of Israel , that they bring unto thee pure oil olive beaten for the light , to cause the lamps to burn continually.\f + \fr 24.2 \ft to cause: Heb. to cause to ascend\f*

Without the vail of the testimony , in the tabernacle of the congregation , shall Aaron order it from the evening unto the morning before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* continually : \add it shall be\add* a statute for ever in your generations.
He shall order the lamps upon the pure candlestick before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* continually. \p
¶ And thou shalt take fine flour , and bake twelve cakes thereof: two tenth deals shall be in one cake.
And thou shalt set them in two rows , six on a row , upon the pure table before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
And thou shalt put pure frankincense upon \add each\add* row , that it may be on the bread for a memorial , \add even\add* an offering made by fire unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
Every sabbath he shall set it in order before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* continually , \add being taken\add* from the children of Israel by an everlasting covenant.

And it shall be Aaron’s and his sons’ ; and they shall eat it in the holy place : for it \add is\add* most holy unto him of the offerings of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* made by fire by a perpetual statute. \p

¶ And the son of an Israelitish woman , whose father \add was\add* an Egyptian , went out among the children of Israel : and this son of the Israelitish \add woman\add* and a man of Israel strove together in the camp ;

And the Israelitish woman’s son blasphemed the name \add of the \+nd LORD\+nd*\add*, and cursed. And they brought him unto Moses : (and his mother’s name \add was\add* Shelomith , the daughter of Dibri , of the tribe of Dan :)

And they put him in ward , that the mind of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* might be shewed them.\f + \fr 24.12 \ft that…: Heb. to expound unto them according to the mouth of the \+nd LORD\+nd*\f*
And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* spake unto Moses , saying ,
Bring forth him that hath cursed without the camp ; and let all that heard \add him\add* lay their hands upon his head , and let all the congregation stone him.
And thou shalt speak unto the children of Israel , saying , Whosoever curseth his God shall bear his sin.

And he that blasphemeth the name of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, he shall surely be put to death , \add and\add* all the congregation shall certainly stone him: as well the stranger , as he that is born in the land , when he blasphemeth the name \add of the \+nd LORD\+nd*\add*, shall be put to death. \p
¶ And he that killeth any man shall surely be put to death.\f + \fr 24.17 \ft killeth…: Heb. smiteth the life of a man\f*
And he that killeth a beast shall make it good ; beast for beast.\f + \fr 24.18 \ft beast for…: Heb. life for life\f*
And if a man cause a blemish in his neighbour ; as he hath done , so shall it be done to him;
Breach for breach , eye for eye , tooth for tooth : as he hath caused a blemish in a man , so shall it be done to him \add again\add*.
And he that killeth a beast , he shall restore it: and he that killeth a man , he shall be put to death.
Ye shall have one manner of law , as well for the stranger , as for one of your own country : for I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your God. \p

¶ And Moses spake to the children of Israel , that they should bring forth him that had cursed out of the camp , and stone him with stones. And the children of Israel did as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* commanded Moses.
